short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch tabs using ctrl+left and ctrl+right, you can customize it at Extensions > The Gear Icon > Manage Extension Shortcuts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch to the tab to the left with ctrl+left, switch to the tab to the right with ctrl+right!
